rules_text:
Whenever a player attacks with two or more creatures, create a Treasure token.
Whenever a player casts their second spell each turn, create a 1/1 colorless Cyborg artifact creature token.
Cybersoul {7}{W}{B} [i]({7}{W}{B}: Transform this. Each artifact you tap while activating pays for {1}. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Indestructible
Whenever a player attacks with two or more creatures, you draw a card and you create a Treasure token.
Whenever a player casts their second spell each turn, create a 1/1 colorless Cyborg artifact creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Cyborg you control.
